Cart.confirmEmptyCart: Are you sure you want to empty your cart?

Checkout.noEmailReceived: Didn't receive an email? Click here

Checkout.paymentError: Something went wrong with the payment
Checkout.bankTransferDescription: Transfer payment to our bank account
Checkout.payOnDeliveryDescription: Pay when your order is delivered

Checkout.contactSupport: Please contact support to complete your order.
Checkout.cardPaymentSetup: Card payment integration is being set up. Please select another payment method.

Checkout.payOnDeliveryInstructions: Pay when your order is delivered to your address. Payment will be collected by our delivery partner.

Checkout.noShippingAvailable: No shipping methods available for this country at the moment.

Checkout.payOnDeliveryPayment: Payment will be collected when your order is delivered to your address.
Checkout.bankTransferNote: Don't forget to include the order number as transfer reference.

consentModal.title: We use cookies
consentModal.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. Manage your preferences below.

privacyChoices.title: Your Privacy Choices
privacyChoices.description: In this panel you can express some preferences related to the processing of your personal information. You may review and change expressed choices at any time by resurfacing this panel via the provided link. To deny your consent to the specific processing activities described below, switch the toggles to off or use the "Reject all" button and confirm you want to save your choices.

necessary.title: Strictly Necessary
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Performance and Analytics
analytics.description: These cookies collect information about how you use our website. All of the data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you.

advertising.title: Targeting and Advertising
advertising.description: These cookies are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you and your interests. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

moreInfo.title: More information
moreInfo.description: For any queries in relation to my policy on cookies and your choices, please contact us
